thread.title: vicki

author: vicki
title: vicki
text: I tried to resolve a problem on the chat service online about a vendor who wouldn't accept a voucher. The chat person told me I was out of luck, which I knew wouldn't be consistent with Groupon's typical customer service. I asked to have it escalated, but there was such a long delay I just hung up and called Groupon. There a refund was offered quickly. I would have given a 5 star review if I hadn't had to make two attempts to fix the problem.
